CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Company_Org_Chart_Received__c)),1,0) + IF(Process_Flow_Implemented__c,1,0) + IF(OR(NOT(ISBLANK(Press_Release__c)),NOT(ISBLANK( Video_Direct_Link_Implementation__c)),NOT(ISBLANK( Video_Direct_Link_Other__c)),NOT(ISBLANK( Video_Direct_Link_Testimonial__c))) ,1,0) + IF( ISN_on_Website_Intranet__c ,1,0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Has_Data_Feed__c)),1,0) + IF( Dallas_Workshop_Held__c ,1,0) + IF( Contractor_List_Update_in_Last_12_Months__c ,1,0) + IF( (Number_of_Subscribed_Sites__c / Number_of_Sites__c ) >= 0.7,1,0) + IF(A_Grade_Conformance__c >= 0.4,1,0) + IF( Subscription_Compliance_Calculated__c >= 0.9,1,0)
CustomField.label: Healthy Account Badge Item Count
